ygData.subject: Guiledart's Piece of Galva
ygData.msgSnippet: Guiledart got a secret message from Galva. I want you to activate the pod we discussed. I wish a piece of me to be revived. Guiledart acknowledged. The pod

Subject: Guiledart's Piece of Galva
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

--part1_6f.10b746e4.27b0262d_boundary
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 Guiledart got a secret message from Galva. "I want you to activate the pod 
we discussed. I wish a piece of me to be revived." 
Guiledart acknowledged. The pod they came in  when they landed lit up. The 
spark came out and produced a new body(Ill leave that to robert dahl what it 
is). Megatron G1 was reborn. Galva a long time ago had that part of his spark 
extracted. Thats why it was so hard to defeat Valtron. The old evil bot 
loomed over the  pod. Guildart smiles at his scanner. He sent a comm to Megs 
"Welcome back G1 Megatron. You have been rebuilt by part of Galvatron's 
spark. You two are not connected in any way. Mental or phsycal. Now please 
meet us at our coordinates. We have much to discuss."
(G1 megatron is now in the hands of Robert Dahl I leave him to you.)

--part1_6f.10b746e4.27b0262d_boundary
